verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mighty is our God,
Mighty is our King;
Mighty is our Lord,
Ruler of everything.
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His name is higher,
Higher than any other name;
His pow'r is greater
For he has created everything.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Glory to our God,
Glory to our King,
Glory to our Lord,
Ruler of everything.
(Repeat)
